posts.post_content:
I have these 2 Old Judges I need to sell for some last minute gift shopping money. SGC A Billy Sunday (great image quality) and a raw (trimmed and probably rebacked) "Sliding" Billy Hamilton. Asking $325 for the Sunday and $275 for the Hamilton, shipped and insured. Please feel free to PM or email with questions or offers. Paypal preferred.

Brandon
[url]browncow75@gmail.com[/url]
[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=43&u=15203709][img]http://i60.servimg.com/u/f60/15/20/37/09/hamilt11.jpg[/img][/url]
